languages.text: "Действительно, зачем утруждать себя попытками разобраться в случившемся, когда можно без лишних рассуждений навесить на человека ярлык еретика и спать спокойно? Только ты, подруженька, так и вертелась вокруг Теодоры, пока летала с нами на корабле. Она тебя спасла, помогла, а стоило тебе услыхать что-то ее порочащее — все, любовь прошла, осыпались цветочки. Ты не удивилась, не расстроилась — просто поставила крест на ее памяти и все".

traits.locale_text: "Ага, ага, Хаос-шмяос. Только ты, подруженька, за Теодорой как утенок за мамой-уткой ходила, пока летала с нами на корабле. Она тебя спасла, помогла, а стоило тебе услыхать что-то ее порочащее — все, любовь прошла, осыпались цветочки. Ты не удивилась, не расстроилась — просто поставила крест на ее памяти и все".

languages.text: "Sure, why go through all the trouble of trying to make sense of anything when you can just label them a heretic and call it a day? Except, dear friend, I seem to remember that you didn't mind Theodora so much while you were aboard the ship. You didn't leave her side for even a moment. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation sullying her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."
languages.original_text: "Действительно, зачем утруждать себя попытками разобраться в случившемся, когда можно без лишних рассуждений навесить на человека ярлык еретика и спать спокойно? Только ты, подруженька, так и вертелась вокруг Теодоры, пока летала с нами на корабле. Она тебя спасла, помогла, а стоило тебе услыхать что-то ее порочащее — все, любовь прошла, осыпались цветочки. Ты не удивилась, не расстроилась — просто поставила крест на ее памяти и все".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, yes, Chaos, shmaos. Except I remember you following Theodora like a baby duck following its mother, dear friend. You didn't leave her side even for a moment while you were aboard the ship. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation that sullied her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."

"Yes, yes, Chaos, shmaos. Except I remember you following Theodora like a baby duck following its mother, dear friend. You didn't leave her side even for a moment while you were aboard the ship. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation that sullied her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."

"Yes, yes, Chaos, shmaos. Except, dear friend, I seem to remember you waddling behind Theodora like a baby duck does its mother. You didn't leave her side for even a moment while you were aboard the ship. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation sullying her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."

"Yes, yes, Chaos, shmaos. Except, dear friend, I seem to remember you waddling behind Theodora like a baby duck does its mother. You didn't leave her side for even a moment while you were aboard the ship. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation sullying her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."

"Sure, why go through all the trouble of trying to make sense of anything when you can just label them a heretic and call it a day? Except, dear friend, I seem to remember that you didn't mind Theodora so much while you were aboard the ship. You didn't leave her side for even a moment. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation sullying her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."

"Yes, yes, Chaos, shmaos. Except, dear friend, I seem to remember you waddling behind Theodora like a duckling does its mother. You didn't leave her side for even a moment while you were aboard the ship. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation sullying her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."

languages.text: «Claro, ¿para qué intentar entender las cosas cuando se puede tildar a la gente de hereje y se acabó? Sin embargo, cuando estaba a bordo de su nave no le tenía tanta manía a Theodora. No se apartó de su lado ni un momento. Ella la rescató, la ayudó, y su adoración se desvaneció nada más escuchar una acusación que manchaba su nombre. No expresó sorpresa ni molestia, simplemente la abandonó y siguió adelante».
languages.original_text: "Sure, why go through all the trouble of trying to make sense of anything when you can just label them a heretic and call it a day? Except, dear friend, I seem to remember that you didn't mind Theodora so much while you were aboard the ship. You didn't leave her side for even a moment. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation sullying her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, sí, Caos, da igual. Excepto que, querida amiga, creo recordar que seguía a Theodora como un patito sigue a su madre. No se apartó de su lado ni un momento mientras estuvo a bordo de la nave. Ella la rescató, la ayudó, y su adoración se desvaneció nada más escuchar una acusación que manchaba su nombre. No expresó sorpresa ni molestia, simplemente la abandonó y siguió adelante».

languages.text: "Sicher, wozu die Mühe machen, in allem einen Sinn zu sehen, wenn man jemanden auch einfach als Ketzer bezeichnen kann und gut? Allerdings glaube ich mich zu erinnern, dass Ihr Euch nicht derart um Theodora gekümmert habt, als Ihr an Bord des Schiffs wart. Ihr seid keinen Augenblick von der Seite gewichen. Sie hat Euch gerettet, hat Euch geholfen, und Eure Bewunderung verkümmerte bei der ersten Anschuldigung, die ihr Andenken besudelte. Ihr wart nicht überrascht oder aufgebracht, Ihr habt sie einfach fallen gelassen und abgehakt."
languages.original_text: "Sure, why go through all the trouble of trying to make sense of anything when you can just label them a heretic and call it a day? Except, dear friend, I seem to remember that you didn't mind Theodora so much while you were aboard the ship. You didn't leave her side for even a moment. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation sullying her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, ja, Chaos, Chaos, blablabla. Nur, werter Freund, erinnere ich mich daran, dass Ihr Theodora hinterhergewackelt seid wie ein Entenküken seiner Mutter. Ihr seid ihr an Bord keinen Augenblick von der Seite gewichen. Sie hat Euch gerettet, hat Euch geholfen, und Eure Bewunderung verkümmerte bei der ersten Anschuldigung, die ihr Andenken besudelte. Ihr wart nicht überrascht oder aufgebracht, Ihr habt sie einfach fallen gelassen und abgehakt."

languages.text: « Bien sûr, pourquoi prendre la peine de chercher à comprendre les autres quand on peut se contenter de les accuser d'hérésie et d'en rester là ? Sauf que, mon amie, je n'ai pas souvenir que Théodora vous ait tant dérangée quand vous étiez à bord du vaisseau. D'ailleurs, vous ne l'avez pas quittée d'une semelle. Elle vous a sauvée, et votre adoration s'est envolée à la seconde même où une accusation est venue ternir sa mémoire. Vous n'étiez ni surprise, ni choquée ; vous l'avez simplement abandonnée, et vous êtes passée à autre chose. »
languages.original_text: "Sure, why go through all the trouble of trying to make sense of anything when you can just label them a heretic and call it a day? Except, dear friend, I seem to remember that you didn't mind Theodora so much while you were aboard the ship. You didn't leave her side for even a moment. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation sullying her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, ben voyons, le Chaos, c'est ça. Sauf que, mon amie, je crois bien me rappeler vous avoir vue vous dandiner derrière Théodora comme un caneton suivant sa mère. Vous ne l'avez pas quittée d'une seule semelle tout le temps que vous étiez à bord du vaisseau. Elle vous a sauvée, et votre adoration s'est envolée à la seconde même où une accusation est venue ternir sa mémoire. Vous n'étiez ni surprise, ni choquée ; vous l'avez simplement abandonnée, et vous êtes passée à autre chose. »

languages.text: “可不是嘛，对于看不顺眼的人，只要直接贴个‘异端分子’的标签就好了，干嘛还要花心思弄清楚真相？不过，我亲爱的朋友，我记得你当时还在这艘船上的时候，你好像也没太介意西奥多拉的做法吧？你对她寸步不离，她也救过你，帮过你。可现在，你听到了这样的指控，觉得会玷污那段回忆，于是你对她的崇敬就立刻烟消云散了。你既不惊讶，也不沮丧——你只是把她抛在脑后，继续前行。”
languages.original_text: "Sure, why go through all the trouble of trying to make sense of anything when you can just label them a heretic and call it a day? Except, dear friend, I seem to remember that you didn't mind Theodora so much while you were aboard the ship. You didn't leave her side for even a moment. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation sullying her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."

traits.locale_text: “是是是，你说混沌就混沌吧。不过啊，我亲爱的朋友，我还记得你当年是怎么亦步亦趋地跟着西奥多拉，就像小鸭子跟着妈妈一样。她在飞船上的时候，你寸步不离。她救过你，帮过你。可现在，你听到了这样的指控，觉得会玷污那段回忆，你对她的崇敬就立刻烟消云散了。你既不惊讶，也不沮丧——你只是把她抛在脑后，继续前行。”

languages.text: 「そうね。異端者のレッテルを貼って終わりにすればいいよね、意味を理解するためにわざわざ苦労する必要はないわよね。ただね、シスター。あたいの記憶では、あんたは船の上では、シオドーラ様のことを全然気にしてなかったじゃない。あんたは片時も彼女の側を離れなかった。彼女はあんたを助けて面倒を見たのに。彼女の記憶を汚す告発を聞いた途端に、心酔していた気持ちは萎んだってことでしょ。驚きも動揺もせずに…ただ彼女に見切りをつけ、あんたは前に進んだのよ」
languages.original_text: "Sure, why go through all the trouble of trying to make sense of anything when you can just label them a heretic and call it a day? Except, dear friend, I seem to remember that you didn't mind Theodora so much while you were aboard the ship. You didn't leave her side for even a moment. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation sullying her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."

traits.locale_text: 「わざわざ相手を理解しようとしないで、異端者のレッテルを貼って終わりにしてもいいとでも？でもね、あんた船の上では、全然あのひとのことを気にしないどころか、片時もあの人の側を離れなかったじゃない。あの人はあなたを助けて面倒を見たのに、あなたは、あの人の記憶を汚す告発を聞いた途端に、心酔していた気持ちは萎んだってワケ。驚きも動揺もせずに…このままあの人を諦めて前に進むのね」

「そうね。異端者のレッテルを貼って終わりにすればいいよね、意味を理解するためにわざわざ苦労する必要はないわよね。ただね、シスター。あたいの記憶では、あんたは船の上では、シオドーラ様のことを全然気にしてなかったじゃない。あんたは片時も彼女の側を離れなかった。彼女はあんたを助けて面倒を見たのに。彼女の記憶を汚す告発を聞いた途端に、心酔していた気持ちは萎んだってことでしょ。驚きも動揺もせずに…ただ彼女に見切りをつけ、あんたは前に進んだのよ」

languages.text: "Tabii canım, birini kâfir diye yaftalayıp işin içinden sıyrılmak varken neden onca şeyi anlamlandırma çabasına giresin ki? Yalnız sevgili dostum, hatırladığım kadarıyla daha düne kadar Theodora seni bu kadar rahatsız etmiyordu. Hatta gemide bir an olsun peşinden ayrılmıyordun. Seni kurtardı, elinden tuttu ama anısına gölge düşüren ilk karalamada onca yaşanmışlığı kenara atıyorsun. Şaşırsan, üzülsen hadi neyse... Ama sen sorgulamadan, işin aslını kurcalamadan kabulleniyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Sure, why go through all the trouble of trying to make sense of anything when you can just label them a heretic and call it a day? Except, dear friend, I seem to remember that you didn't mind Theodora so much while you were aboard the ship. You didn't leave her side for even a moment. She rescued you, aided you, and your adoration wilted the moment you heard an accusation sullying her memory. You weren't surprised or upset — you just gave up on her and moved on."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii canım, birini kâfir diye yaftalayıp işin içinden sıyrılmak varken neden onca şeyi anlamlandırma çabasına giresin ki? Yalnız sevgili dostum, hatırladığım kadarıyla daha düne kadar Theodora seni bu kadar rahatsız etmiyordu. Hatta gemide bir an olsun peşinden ayrılmıyordun. Seni kurtardı, elinden tuttu ama anısına gölge düşüren ilk karalamada onca yaşanmışlığı kenara atıyorsun. Şaşırsan, üzülsen hadi neyse... Ama sen sorgulamadan, işin aslını kurcalamadan kabulleniyorsun."
